title: 2009 NBA Finals
summary: The 2009 NBA Finals was the championship series of the National Basketball Association's (NBA) 2008â€“09 season. The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Western Conference champion Los Angeles Lakers (who were also the defending Western Conference champions), and the Eastern Conference champion Orlando Magic.[1] The Lakers were favored to win the championship over the Magic.[2] The Lakers defeated the Magic, four games to one, to win the franchise's 15th NBA championship. The 63rd edition of the championship series was played between June 4 and June 14 and was broadcast on U.S. television on ABC.
